LanguageData.DMS_Civilian01.description: [PAWN_nameDef] participated in the grand colonization and came to a rimworld. [PAWN_pronoun] underwent extensive survival physical fitness training during voyage. Compared to most people who live on this planet [PAWN_pronoun] is fully prepared.
LanguageData.DMS_Civilian01.title: Colonial Pioneer
LanguageData.DMS_Civilian02.description: [PAWN_nameDef] participated in the grand colonization and came to a rimworld. [PAWN_pronoun] is one of the most experienced colonists in the Colonization Force, having participated in numerous successful and failed colonization attempts in their lifetime.
LanguageData.DMS_Civilian02.title: Survival Expert
LanguageData.DMS_Civilian03.description: [PAWN_nameDef] participated in the grand colonization and came to a rimworld. Their job was to establish an functional forward outpost well in advance of the main Colonial Force and send data back to show the fleet that the planet was still worth the long voyage.
LanguageData.DMS_Civilian03.title: Colonial Astropath
LanguageData.DMS_Civilian04.description: [PAWN_nameDef] participated in the grand colonization and came to a rimworld. Their duty was to exterminate any alien diseases or biological hazards found by the forward outpost in advance of the main Colonial Force's arrival.
LanguageData.DMS_Civilian04.title: Xeno Biologist
LanguageData.DMS_Civilian05.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is from a professional pioneering group. [PAWN_nameDef] was responsible for researching the flora and fauna of the planet before the arrival of the main Colonial Force to make their future colonization work easier.
LanguageData.DMS_Civilian05.title: Xeno Ecologist
LanguageData.DMS_Civilian06.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is from a professional pioneering group. [PAWN_nameDef] was responsible for operating the orbital detector relays to complete geological surveys on the planet before the arrival of the main Colonial Force.
LanguageData.DMS_Civilian06.title: Geologist
LanguageData.DMS_Civilian07.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is from a professional pioneering group. [PAWN_nameDef] was responsible for the planning and construction of permanent and temporary structures at the landing sites. Of course, [PAWN_pronoun] had to learn how to save their own life from the local hostile life forms.
LanguageData.DMS_Civilian07.title: Colonial Architect
LanguageData.DMS_Civilian08.description: Most rimworlds are in a state of disorganized anarchy, but [PAWN_nameDef] worked to establish good relations with the indigenous groups on behalf of the Colonial Force.
LanguageData.DMS_Civilian08.title: Local Diplomat
LanguageData.DMS_Civilian09.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was responsible for cultivating crops for the community as well as testing soil compatibility levels for future projects. [PAWN_pronoun] tracked monitored the growth of different crops and grew those suitable for local conditions.
LanguageData.DMS_Civilian09.title: Colonial Farmer
LanguageData.DMS_Civilian10.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was responsible for smithing tools and replacement parts for a colony site where a stamping printer was not allocated. [PAWN_pronoun] developed a working knowledge of cutting and assembly machinery.
LanguageData.DMS_Civilian10.title: Colonial Mechanic
LanguageData.DMS_Civilian11.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has been working in mines almost all their life. [PAWN_nameDef] Has been digging manually, with machinery, and with explosives and become something of an expert on the matter.
LanguageData.DMS_Civilian11.title: Colonial Miner
